## EntityCrudRepository.delete() method

Delete an entity

**Signature:**

```typescript
delete(entity: DataObject<T>, options?: Options): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entity | [DataObject](./repository.dataobject.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | Entity to be deleted |
|  options | [Options](./repository.options.md) | _(Optional)_ Options for the operations |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A promise that will be resolve if the operation succeeded or will be rejected if the entity was not found.
